dt-api.name: columns().responsiveHidden()
dt-api.summary: Get the responsive visibility state of columns in the table

type.description: For the selected columns, determine if Responsive has hidden them or not.
type.returns: API instance that contains boolean values in the result set - `true` if the column is responsive visible, `false` otherwise.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to determine the Responsive visibility state of columns in a table.
Please note that this is not the same as the column visibility control built into DataTables (`-api columns().visible()` / `-init columns.visible`) - Responsive implements its own column hiding.
